scripts.test-scheduler: echo 'Use: gh workflow run delta-scheduler.yml -f dry_run=true'
scripts.test-progress: echo 'Use: gh workflow run delta-progress.yml -f dry_run=true'
scripts.test-report: echo 'Use: gh workflow run delta-report.yml -f dry_run=true'
scripts.test-watchdog: echo 'Use: gh workflow run delta-watchdog.yml -f dry_run=true'
scripts.test-notify: echo 'Use: gh workflow run delta-notify.yml -f dry_run=true'
scripts.test-digest: echo 'Use: gh workflow run delta-digest.yml -f dry_run=true'
scripts.cleanup:preview: gh workflow run workflow-cleanup.yml -f cleanup_scope=failed_runs -f dry_run=true
scripts.cleanup:failed: gh workflow run workflow-cleanup.yml -f cleanup_scope=failed_runs -f dry_run=false
scripts.cleanup:old: gh workflow run workflow-cleanup.yml -f cleanup_scope=old_runs -f days_to_keep=7 -f dry_run=false
scripts.cleanup:cache: gh workflow run workflow-cleanup.yml -f cleanup_scope=cache_cleanup -f dry_run=false
scripts.cleanup:full: gh workflow run workflow-cleanup.yml -f cleanup_scope=full_cleanup -f dry_run=false
scripts.cleanup:help: echo 'Workflow Cleanup Commands:' && echo '  npm run cleanup:preview  - Preview what would be cleaned' && echo '  npm run cleanup:failed   - Clean failed/cancelled runs' && echo '  npm run cleanup:old      - Clean runs older than 7 days' && echo '  npm run cleanup:cache    - Clean cache and artifacts' && echo '  npm run cleanup:full     - ⚠️  FULL cleanup (ALL data)'
